original_title: 未熟な姦情 年下部下と人妻OL 松下紗栄子
overview: Saeko is a married office lady who works madly, this creates some tensions with her husband. Saeko also has a young subordinate who admires her. While they are having an overnight business trip, this young subordinate jumps on Saeko, who doesn’t resist that much to be honest.
title: Immature Adultery: Married Woman Office Lady And Her Younger Subordinate – Saeko Matsushita
